German[edit]

Pronunciation[edit]

  • Audio
    		(file)

Noun[edit]

Anmeldung f (genitive Anmeldung, plural Anmeldungen)

  1. application
  2. announcement, booking, registration
  3. (computing) login, logon
  4. (finance) reporting

Declension[edit]

Declension of Anmeldung

dativeeinerderAnmeldungdenAnmeldungen
